recipesJson.name: Summer Punch
recipesJson.author: Juicefairy
recipesJson.description: This is a Cold fruity refreshing summer vape that depicts the picture. Sweetened to taste. I used 1% sweetener and I have to steep menthol for around a week so that the minty flavor subsides, but the menthol with polar blast creates a nice cold frozen drink. If you want it even colder on the inhale you can add 0.5% WS-23.
